custom-action.name: transfererc20token
custom-action.description:
Send ERC20 token in the network .
Possible parameters are: - ipOfTheWhiteblockNode (required): Ip of one of the Whiteblock Node Default value is "Ip of one of the Whiteblock Node ". - from (required): Address of the account that will send the transaction Default value is "Address of the account that will send the transaction". - to (required): Address of the account that will receive the transaction Default value is "Address of the account that will receive the transaction". - amount (required): Amount to send Default value is "Amount to send". - contractadress (required): Adress of the smart contract Default value is "Adress of the smart contract". - TraceMode (optional): enable loggin details : true: enable ; false : Disable Default value is "enable logging ".
